title: 2026年中国人工智能：存量、增量、变量的激战
description: 科技巨头AI路径的分歧，本质上是技术理想与商业现实之间的权衡。
titleZh: 2026年中国人工智能：存量、增量、变量的激战
titleEn: China's AI in 2026: A Fierce Battle Over Stock, Increment, and Variables
descriptionZh: 科技巨头AI路径的分歧，本质上是技术理想与商业现实之间的权衡。
descriptionEn: The divergence in the AI paths of tech giants is, in essence, a trade-off between technological ideals and commercial realities. These choices are not about superiority or inferiority; they are different predictions about the ultimate outcome of AI.
